thesis_summary: AI infrastructure picks-and-shovels play with dominant datacenter positioning. CUDA ecosystem creates high switching costs and developer lock-in. Different risk profile now as cyclicality matters more at current scale, but secular AI demand provides multi-year runway.

Quality compounder with unmatched ecosystem lock-in across 2B+ active devices. Services segment drives margin expansion and recurring revenue. Capital return program provides valuation floor while innovation pipeline addresses growth concerns.

Cloud leader with Azure maintaining growth premium versus peers. AI integration across Office and enterprise suite creates upsell opportunity. GitHub and LinkedIn provide unique data assets. Balance sheet optionality for M&A.

AWS profit engine funds strategic retail investments. Advertising business emerging as high-margin third pillar. Logistics network represents $100B+ invested moat. Retail margin normalization provides earnings upside.

Social engagement near-monopoly with 3B+ daily users across family of apps. Reels monetization closing gap with TikTok. Reality Labs spending moderating. Cost discipline restored credibility with investors.

Search monopoly with 90%+ share generates durable cash flows. YouTube and Cloud provide growth vectors. AI capabilities underappreciated despite Gemini progress. Regulatory risk priced in at current multiple.

EV market leader with manufacturing cost advantages versus legacy OEMs. Energy storage business reaching inflection. Autonomy optionality not reflected in base case. Brand strength supports premium pricing.

Best-in-class bank with scale advantages across all business lines. Technology investments widening competitive moat. Fortress balance sheet enables countercyclical deployment. Management depth unmatched in sector.

Payments duopoly with secular shift from cash providing long runway. Network effects create insurmountable barriers. Asset-light model generates exceptional returns on capital. Cross-border recovery supports near-term growth.

Vertically integrated healthcare platform with unique data assets. Optum growth engine diversifies away from insurance risk. Scale advantages in pharmacy benefits and care delivery. Regulatory risk manageable given bipartisan support for managed care.

Enterprise cloud leader with mission-critical CRM platform. Platform ecosystem creates customer stickiness. AI integration (Einstein) differentiates versus competition. Margin expansion story intact after activist involvement.

Membership model creates predictable recurring revenue base. Traffic-driving pricing strategy maintains value perception. E-commerce integration progressing without cannibalizing warehouse experience. International expansion provides long-term growth runway.

Dominant home improvement retailer with Pro customer momentum. Interconnected retail strategy driving wallet share gains. Housing market exposure cuts both ways but installed base supports repair demand. Supply chain investments improve service levels.

Monopoly supplier of EUV lithography equipment critical to leading-edge chips. Order book provides multi-year visibility. Customer concentration risk offset by mission-critical positioning. Capacity expansion supports demand through 2030.

GLP-1 franchise leader with Ozempic and Wegovy driving unprecedented demand. Manufacturing capacity key constraint being addressed. Obesity indication expands TAM by order of magnitude. Pipeline depth underappreciated.
